name: Snake and Ladders Kingdom Free Ludo Dice Boardgame
name_original: Snake and Ladders Kingdom Free Ludo Dice Boardgame
description:
Snake and Ladders Kingdom Free Ludo is now a completely free dice board game based on an ancient Indian board game where it was known with the name Mokshapat or Moksha Patamu.

Snake and Ladder Kingdom Free Ludo is a multiplayer dice game played by up to four players.

The objective of the completely free Snake and Ladder Kingdom Free Ludo board game is to navigate according to die rolls, climb from the bottom square to the top square, helped by ladders or hindered by snakes.
The one who masters to get to the top square first has won the funny board game.
The historic board game version had root in morality lessons, where a player's progression up the board represented a life journey complicated by virtues (ladders) and vices (snakes). A board game version without morality lessons is also known as Chutes and Ladders.

Snake and Ladder Kingdom Free Ludo dice board game features:
• Play Snakes and Ladders Kingdom Free against computer
• Snakes and Ladders Kingdom Free is a multiplayer board game that can be played by up to 4 players
• Play Snakes and Ladders Kingdom Free on your smartphones or tablets
• Shake your phone or tip on dice
• Choose avatar and flag representing you and your friends
• Funny sound and icon effects

Do you miss any flag or avatar? Send an email to appdepp007@gmail.com!

Other international names for Snakes and Ladders: Ludo, Chutes and Ladders, Cobras e Escadas, Serpientes y Escaleras, Schlangen und Leitern
